name: "Supergirl" Season 2 Episode 9 Multiple Choice Quiz | Television | 10 Questions

questions.text: What happened to Supergirl in the opening scene?
questions.correct: She was shot by a rocket
options: She was hit by a meteor
A tree fell on her head
questions.explanation:
She was shot by a rocket.

	She was chasing down a van with several robbers in it when they opened the back door and launched a rocket at her. She still stopped the van, but several of the criminals had time to escape. Guardian showed up to help catch the ones that otherwise had gotten away.

questions.text: James took time to write a story, what was the topic?
questions.explanation:
The Guardian.

	Supergirl/Kara still didn't know that James was the Guardian. She wrote a story about the jewel thieves promoting Supergirl, James did the same promoting The Guardian. CatCo. Magazine editor Snapper Carr didn't read either at the time they both pitched their stories to him.

questions.text: What did Snapper Carr want with his coffee?
questions.explanation:
A danish.

	He wanted a coffee, danish and five minutes of time to himself. He was played by Ian Gomez.

questions.text: What job did Mon-El have in this episode?
questions.explanation:
Bartender.

	It was his third job in the eight episodes he had appeared in. He also served as a CatCo intern and a mob enforcer in previous episodes.

questions.text: After travelling through a portal Supergirl lost her powers.
questions.explanation:
True.

	She landed on a planet with a red sun, which took away her powers. Mon-El followed her through the portal and by the time they realized what had happened the portal shut down and stranded them on the planet.

questions.text: Who got caught in the trap on the alien planet?
questions.explanation:
Mon-El.

	While Kara/Supergirl and Mon-El were walking toward a settlement where the they suspected missing humans were being hidden. After being caught by trap they were freed by a local inhabitant and found out the name of the planet was Maldoria.

questions.text: Who was behind the slave trade of the humans?
questions.explanation:
Roulette.

	She was the same character who was running the alien fight club a few episodes earlier. She is played by Dichen Lachman. Roulette told Supergirl that she was running the human trafficking ring because of her club being shut down.

questions.text: Who was the girl that went missing, eventually alerting Supergirl to the human trafficking ring?
questions.explanation:
Izzy.

	Izzy's mother showed up at the magazine that Kara worked at. After Kara promised to help find her missing daughter Snapper Carr told her that "runaway teens" weren't news. Supergirl then investigated it. Harley Quinn Smith, the episode director's daughter played Izzy.

questions.text: What weapon did Alex bring with her to the planet?
questions.explanation:
Yellow sun grenade.

	She called it a little taste of home. The grenade set off an area filled with radiation from a yellow sun. That allowed Supergirl to use her powers on the planet.

questions.text: Kara wrote a story about the accounts on the "slaver's moon". Snapper Carr was very upset that she did it.
questions.explanation:
False.

	He appeared neither happy or upset that she wrote it while she was in the room. She bragged a bit about following the lead and how that was how she wanted to be as a reporter. After she walked out of the room he smiled and praised her without her knowing.
